org.openbel.framework.core.df.encryption
Class KamStoreEncryptionServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.openbel.framework.core.df.encryption.AbstractEncryptionService
      org.openbel.framework.core.df.encryption.AesEncryptionServiceImpl
          org.openbel.framework.core.df.encryption.KamStoreEncryptionServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
EncryptionService, SymmetricEncryptionService
public class KamStoreEncryptionServiceImpl
extends AesEncryptionServiceImpl

A simplified version of AES encryption. Encryption key is constructed from a passphrase. Initialization vector is not used for this implementation.
